installCommand: if [ -d GGospelGT/frontend ]; then cd GGospelGT/frontend; elif [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend; else echo 'frontend directory not found'; exit 1; fi; npm install --legacy-peer-deps
buildCommand: if [ -d GGospelGT/frontend ]; then cd GGospelGT/frontend; elif [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend; else echo 'frontend directory not found'; exit 1; fi; npm run build
